thread.title: SRK Ensures Mahira Khan That They Will Look Good Onscreen
thread.title_full: SRK Ensures Mahira Khan That They Will Look Good Onscreen

title: SRK Ensures Mahira Khan That They Will Look Good Onscreen
text:
Photos Shah Rukh Khan in and as 'Raees' | Facebook Photo 
NEW DELHI: You might not come over the magic of Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol’s chemistry, but the actor who will be launching Mahira Khan in his upcoming ‘Raees’ promises that this jodi will look good too. 
The Pakistani actress recently gushed over the 49-year-old actor and Kajol’s chemistry by tweeting, “Film toh joh kamaal banayega woh toh banayega Rohit. Abhi usne joh photo lee hai woh dekh lo. #Dilwale @iamsrk Uffff!You both, Uff!” 
Replying to the 32-year-old actress’ tweet, ‘Badshah’ khan tweeted, “@TheMahiraKhan just saw your tweet. ‘Uff’ we will look good in Raees too. Hope all is well with you and family.” 
Directed by Rahul Dholakia the film is slated to release on July 3.
